content: woven puff scarf supplies 5mm i crochet hook 6 5mm k crochet hook yarn needle scissors gauge 5 stitches and 8 row in 4 inches finished size width 8 inches length 64 inches steps to make scarf 5mm crochet hook 1 chain 23 2 insert your hook into the 3rd chain from the hook and pull up a loop 2 loops on the hook 3 yarn over insert your hook into the same stitch and pull up a loop 4 loops on the hook 4 yarn over insert your hook into the same stitch and pull up a loop 6 loops on the hook 5 yarn over and pull through all six loops on the hook 6 chain 1 to secure the stitch 7 skip the next chain 8 insert your hook and pull up a loop 2 loops on hook 9 yarn over insert your hook into the same stitch and pull up a loop 4 loops on the hook 10 yarn over insert your hook into the same stitch and pull up a loop 6 loops on the hook 11 yarn over and pull through all six loops on the hook 12 chain 1 to secure the stitch 13 repeat steps 7 12 until you reach the end of the row 11 puff stitches 14 chain 1 turn 15 you will now be crocheting into each of the previous puff stitches do not crochet into the chain stitches used to secure the puffs 16 repeat steps 8 14 until your scarf is 64 inches 122 row 17 single_crochet evenly around the scarf 122 sts on each of the long sides 22 sts on the short sides 18 fasten_off and sew in ends to add tassels switch to a 6 5mm crochet hook 19 cut four 12-inch sections of yarn 20 fold over and pull the loop through the first stitch on the short side using the crochet hook 21 pull the free end through the loop and tighten 22 skip the next 2 stitches 23 repeat steps 19 22 until the end of the row 24 repeat steps 19 23 on the other short side
